
select ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePolygon( ST_GeomFromEWKT(
'LINESTRING(
1539712.07443 5187156.66073,
 1539726.66152 5187159.86989,
 1539734.2468 5187115.23339,
 1539720.53494 5187114.35817,

1539712.07443 5187156.66073
)')), 4326)

union

select ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePolygon( ST_GeomFromEWKT(
'LINESTRING(
13.8334246 42.1739034,

13.8334461 42.1740113,

13.8335346 42.1739993,

13.8335191 42.173893,

13.8334246 42.1739034)')), 4326)



union
select ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePolygon( ST_GeomFromEWKT(
'LINESTRING(
13.8324865 42.1734095,

13.8324282 42.1735039,

13.8325415 42.1735426,

13.8326025 42.1734467,

13.8324865 42.1734095)')), 4326)

union
select ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePolygon( ST_GeomFromEWKT(
'LINESTRING(

1539961.119 5187194.44732,
 1539977.25496 5187195.04495,
 1539978.05179 5187179.70583,
 1539960.52137 5187179.10821,

1539961.119 5187194.44732)')), 4326);
---------------------
--- verdaderamente en 4326
select ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePolygon( ST_GeomFromEWKT(
'LINESTRING(
13.8295519744 42.1744365853,
 13.8295033934 42.1742924617,
 13.8296718074 42.1742455001,
 13.8297560144 42.1744948824,
 13.8296297039 42.1745305085,
 13.8296021747 42.1744673532,
 13.8295519744 42.1744365853)
 ')), 4326)
 union


select ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePolygon( ST_GeomFromEWKT(
'LINESTRING(
13.8293948959 42.1742552163,
 13.8295746455 42.1741888223,
 13.8295422582 42.1740981379,
 13.8293576505 42.1741596737,
 13.8293948959 42.1742552163

) ')), 4326)
 union

 select ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePolygon( ST_GeomFromEWKT(
'LINESTRING(
13.8292702048 42.1745547989,
 13.8293365987 42.1744867856,
 13.8294823416 42.1746179542,
 13.8294159477 42.174692445,
 13.8292702048 42.1745547989
) ')), 4326)
